channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: EnGenius AI Surveillance Camera Has Built-In Facial And License Plate Recognition

item.title: Google’s Hot New AI Coding Tool Was Hacked A Day After Launch
item.description: A security researcher discovered a major flaw in the coding product, the latest example of companies rushing out AI tools vulnerable to hacking.

item.title: iOS 26.2 Update—Here’s What’s Landing On Your iPhone Next Month
item.description: Apple’s iOS 26.2 is coming soon, along with a bunch of cool new features for your iPhone. Here’s what to expect from the latest update.

item.title: London Cyberattacks Confirmed — Security Experts Issue Multiple Warnings
item.description: Multiple London councils have been hit by cyberattacks overnight — what we know so far.
